short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds additional functionality to the IncidentIQ web application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension aims to add additional functionality to IncidentIQ. Simply install and refresh your *.incidentiq.com webpage. Check options to enable/disable features.

Features:
Tickets
- Adds ticket number to header when tickets are navigated to
Assets
- Adds a copy button for the asset and serial
RapidScan
- Adds sounds to RapidScan
Batch Check In
- Auto focus the device field after scanning storage box
Administration > Issues
- Hide unused categories of issues and unused resolution actions when configuring these options. A toggle button is present to show the unused options.


Feel free to upvote ideas regarding these enhancements here:

Asset Copy Buttons
https://community.incidentiq.com/ideas/copy-button-for-asset-or-serial-2344

RapidScan Sounds
https://community.incidentiq.com/ideas/add-auditory-feedback-to-rapid-scan-2047

Ticket Number Always Visible
https://community.incidentiq.com/ideas/ticket-number-always-visible-677

Disclaimer:
This extension is not affiliated with Incident IQ in any way.
